product_entries.full_product_description: 01II.900.10 | Supply of Yoke supports for transmitters/ preamplifiers (wherever applicable) including supply, fabrication and erection of instrument yoke of all types and painting of yoke supports but exclusive of mounting of Instrument on supports.
product_entries.core_product_name: yoke supports for transmitters or preamplifiers
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: including supply, fabrication and erection of instrument yoke of all types and painting of yoke supports but exclusive of mounting of instrument on supports

product_entries.full_product_description: 01II.900.40 | Identification of instrument items wherever required including supply of approved  colour of paint/ paints (Fluorescent), painting of tag number (approx 25-50 mm high)on instrument item like transmitter, switches, level gauges, control valves etc. as specified by Engineer-in-Charge.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: including supply of approved colour of paint or paints (fluorescent), painting of tag number on instrument item like transmitter, switches, level gauges, control valves etc. as specified by engineer-in-charge

product_entries.full_product_description: 01II.900.60 | CHIEF CONTROLLER OF EXPLOSIVE( CCE) CERTIFICATES FOR FIELD ELECTRICAL/ ELECTRONIC INSTRUMENTS & ACCESSORIES AND EQUIPMENTS
product_entries.core_product_name: chief controller of explosive certificates for field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments
product_entries.acronymed_core_product_name: cce certificates for field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments

product_entries.full_product_description: 01II.900.60.1 | Obtaining  certificate of approval from Chief Controller Of Explosives( CCE) for field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments  based on type test certificate made available from the instrument vendors including submission of  application to statutory authorities , necessary fees, all test certificates, equipment drawings in required volumes, interaction with the authorities, follow-up for  approval, obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization of field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments.
product_entries.core_product_name: obtaining certificate of approval from chief controller of explosives for field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: based on type test certificate made available from the instrument vendors including submission of application to statutory authorities, necessary fees, all test certificates, equipment drawings in required volumes, interaction with the authorities, follow-up for approval, obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization of field electrical or electronic instruments and accessories and equipments

original_rows.3: Identification of instrument items wherever required including supply of approved  colour of paint/ paints (Fluorescent), painting of tag number (approx 25-50 mm high)on instrument item like transmitter, switches, level gauges, control valves etc. as specified by Engineer-in-Charge.
CHIEF CONTROLLER OF EXPLOSIVE( CCE) CERTIFICATES FOR FIELD ELECTRICAL/ ELECTRONIC INSTRUMENTS & ACCESSORIES AND EQUIPMENTS

Obtaining  certificate of approval from Chief Controller Of Explosives( CCE) for field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments  based on type test certificate made available from the instrument vendors including submission of  application to statutory authorities , necessary fees, all test certificates, equipment drawings in required volumes, interaction with the authorities, follow-up for  approval, obtaining necessary approval certificate before energization of field electrical/electronic  instruments & accessories  and equipments.
